title: March for Meals event in Florence to benefit seniors group
title_page: March for Meals event in Florence to benefit seniors group
maintext:
FLORENCE, S.C. – Tickets are on sale now for the Senior Citizens Associations Meals on Wheels “March for Meals” fundraiser.
A walk at Leatherman Senior Center’s Fitness Trail will start at 10 a.m. Saturday, March 9, and plate pick-up will start at 11 a.m. Dining in or driving through will be available until 3 p.m.
The $10 tickets will be for a barbecue plate. The plate will include half of a barbecued chicken, yellow rice, green beans, potato salad and a slice of cake.
As of now, there are more than 330 seniors on the waiting list that show the need of a meal. Current resources are not enough to fill the gap and the Senior Citizens Association needs help to raise the funds to bridge that gap.
The association is also looking for additional sponsors for this event. If interested in sponsoring this event, call Jesseca Horton 843-669-6761 ext 231 or email her at sca.marketing@sc.twcbc.com.
